00020         void XMLLoadable::queryBoolAttribute(TiXmlElement *element,
00021                 const string &attribute, bool *value) const
00022         {
00023             if(element->Attribute(attribute.c_str())) {
00024                 string str = element->Attribute(attribute.c_str());
00025                 if(str == "true")
00026                     *value = true;
00027                 else if(str == "false")
00028                     *value = false;
00029                 else
00030                     LogManager::getInstance()->error(
00031                             "Bool attributes should be true or false.");
00032             }
00033         }
00034 
00035         void XMLLoadable::load(TiXmlElement *element)
00036         {
00037             /* First load data from another file. */
00038             if(element->Attribute("filename"))
00039                 load(element->Attribute("filename"));
00040             /* Now load the specific data. */
00041             loadData(element);
00042         }
00043 
00044         void XMLLoadable::load(const string &fileName)
00045         {
00046             LogManager *logManager = LogManager::getInstance();
00047 
00048             TiXmlDocument *document = new TiXmlDocument(fileName.c_str());
00049             if(document->LoadFile()) {
00050                 load(document->RootElement());
00051             } else {
00052                 logManager->warning("Could not load xml document: %s.",
00053                         fileName.c_str());
00054             }
00055             delete document;
00056         }
00057     }
00058 }
